A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie is second only to 'The Blair Witch Project' as the most overhyped movie of all time. 

Some observations:
General Hux - a strange amalgam of Moff Tarkin and Barney Fife.

Ben "Kylo Ren" Solo - There is no possible combination of DNA from Carrie Fisher and Harrison Ford could produce Adam Driver

Captain Phasma - and the point of this character is... ?

Maz Kanata - ibid

Weird sea creature with silicone implanted cow udders - The scene could have only been made worse by having Luke get squirted in the eye

Light saber toss over the shoulder - Who doesn't toss away irreplaceable family heirlooms like an empty can of Bud Light?

Faster-than-light capable interstellar starships - Who would've guessed they get such crappy gas mileage?

Death Stars\, tie-fighters\, X-wings\, blasters\, etc - all made by Halliburton - I certainly feel hoodwinked. Don't you?

Poe Dameron - if only someone had realized sooner that friendly fire can be a good thing\, there would be more than ten people left in the "resistance"

Snoke - immensely powerful\, immensely old. How old is he? What species is he? Where and from whom did he learn how to use the force? How did he gain control of the First Order? It's a good thing they killed his ass otherwise we would all be forced to contemplate satisfying answers to these questions.

Has it occurred to anyone else that Jar Jar Binks has a deeper back story than Snoke?

Rey - By golly isn't she a fast learner? I bet she could even show up on 'The Voice' and win that too.

Disney has fatally wounded Star Wars. It will not recover from this. The mythos is ruined forever\, and there is no fixing it.
